page.title: 06Girls playground games
page.content: {Doctor Doctor}-Holding hands,1 person closes her eyes,the others get in a muddle,& shout Doctor Doctor.She opens her eyes & has to get them out of the muddle. {Jacks}-Sometimes called 5 stones.Five jacks or more & a ball required.Trow the ball up in the air,& try to pick the jacks up while it is in the air,then catch ball. {Grandmothers footsteps}-Someone has their back to you,you quietly walk up behind them.When the person turns round,you freeze until she turns. Object is to creep up to grandmother. {Block}-A person is on,hiding their face they count up to 100.They start to look for the others.The hiders if spotted, try to run to base & shout 1,2,3 & their name. {Other games}-Skipping,Knives,forks & spoons,Queenie-O,Hide & Seek,Hopscotch
